act.title: The Central Electricity Regulatory Commission (Preparation of Annual Report) Rules, 20051
act.article:
1 Short title and commencement.—1[
1 These rules may be called the Central Electricity Regulatory Commission (Preparation of Annual Report) Rules, 2005.]
2 They shall come into force on the date of their publication in the Official Gazette.
4 Submission of annual report.—The copies of the annual report shall be forwarded by the Central Commission to the Central Government by the end of October each year.
